remarks: The direct sum of a family of modules is a module.  See also the remark in [Lang] p. 128.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dsmmlss.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
dsmmlss.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) $.
dsmmlss.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> LMod ) $.
dsmmlss.k $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R ` x ) ) = S ) $.
dsmmlmod.c $e |- C = ( S (+)m R ) $.
dsmmlmod $p |- ( ph -> C e. LMod ) $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
